text: JÃ¼rgen Rottmann (born October 8, 1941) is a Chilean ornithologist. He is a founding member of the Chilean Committee for the Defence of Flora and Fauna and founder and past president of the Chilean Union of Ornithologists. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean environmentalists Category:Scientists from Santiago Category:Ornithologists Category:Chilean biologists
